ee sandaha ayadumpath bara ganima agosthu 19 da awasan kerena athara siyaluma ayadumpath adala dinata pera liyapadinchi thapalen lekam, shri lanka dal pandu sammelanaya torintan pedesa (torintan nawa gruhastha kridagaraya) kolambaa 07 lipinayata yomu kala yuthuya. 2018 wasare saha 2019 wasare pawathwimata niyamitha jathyanthara mattame dalpandu tharagawali dekak ilakka kara gena jathika puhunukaru thanathura sandaha ayadumpath kadawa athi bawa shri lanka dalpandu sammelanaye sabhapathi triksi nanayakkara mahathmiya pawasayi.
